sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import Button from '../ButtonElements'; import {InfoContainer, InfoWrapper, InfoRow, Column1, Column2, TextWrapper, TopLine, Heading, Subtitle, BtnWrap, ImgWrap, Img} from './InfoElements' const InfoSection = ({lightBg, id, imgStart, topLine, lightText, headline, darkText, description, buttonLabel, img, alt}) => { return ( <> {topLine} {headline} {description} ) } export default InfoSection
